attributionInfo.mlsDisclaimer:
IDX information is provided exclusively for personal, non-commercial use, and may not be used for any purpose other than to identify prospective properties consumers may be interested in purchasing. Information is deemed reliable but not guaranteed.

The listing broker’s offer of compensation is made only to participants of the MLS where the listing is filed.

data.description: Walk-through video: https://youtu.be/bw9XtDGERb8 Lakefront living awaits you at this beautiful colonial home in pocotopaug lake community. 4 bedroom, 3 full baths and Multi Level Deck with cable railing overlooks the lake. Resort-Style Outdoor Living! In Summer- cool off, relax & enjoy breathtaking views of the largest natural lake in CT while you are spending time boating skating, fishing, or diving off the dock. outdoor kitchen with pizza oven, grill, sink, refrigerator Ideal for family gathering time. The main floor comes with desirable open concept living area, dining room and kitchen with quartz countertop, stainless appliances, along with 2 bedroom and a full bath. The master bedroom has a cathedral ceiling with 4 sky light, home office, multiple closets, full tiled bathroom, and sliders to a private deck area all in separate level. Lower-level family room with fireplace, a bedroom, full bath with laundry set-up. This amazing waterfront property offers hardwood flooring throughout the house, central AC, new siding, fresh paint throughout, new kitchen, new dock, CUSTOM PRIVACY FENCE, new patio, floating boat house.
